title: Bug 21706BidiUtil in win32 has Class.forName() usage
description: Bug 21706BidiUtil in win32 has Class.forName() usage
OB: The software uses Class.forName() in org.eclipse.swt.internal.BidiUtil. It creates a new instance of Callback with the parameters BidiUtil.class, "windowProc", and 4. BidiUtil.class is a syntax shortcut for Class.forName("org...BidiUtil"). However, this method throws a NoClassDefFoundError, which is not defined in the CLDC class libraries. This issue affects the CLDC version of SWT. The problem is only observable when using jxeLink or a similar verification process. The Eclipse compiler and Sun's compiler do not raise compiler errors for this issue.
